columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the configuration store. Possible values include: 'Creating', 'Updating', 'Deleting', 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Canceled'.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: The creation date of configuration store.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: The DNS endpoint where the configuration store API will be available.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: Control permission for data plane traffic coming from public networks while private endpoint is enabled. Possible values include: 'Enabled', 'Disabled'.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: The SKU name of the configuration store.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the configuration store.

columns.name: encryption
columns.description: The encryption settings of the configuration store.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The managed identity information, if configured.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: The list of private endpoint connections that are set up for this resource.
